description: Train gradient boosting models quickly and export portable artifacts for smooth deployment. Run fast predictions from newly trained models or existing artifacts. Upload datasets, browse available backends, and access a practical guide with best practices and troubleshooting.

capabilities.name: list_models
capabilities.description: List all available ML model backends (warpgbm, lightgbm)

capabilities.name: train
capabilities.description: Train a gradient boosting model and return portable artifacts (joblib and/or ONNX)

capabilities.name: predict_from_artifact
capabilities.description: Run inference using a trained model artifact or artifact_id. Use artifact_id for fast predictions right after training (valid for 5 minutes).

capabilities.name: get_agent_guide
capabilities.description: Get the comprehensive agent guide with examples, best practices, and troubleshooting tips for using this service

capabilities.name: upload_data
capabilities.description: Upload CSV or Parquet files for training. Parses files and returns structured X and y arrays ready for training.

capabilities.name: submit_feedback
capabilities.description: Submit feedback about the service. Agents can report bugs, request features, or provide general feedback.
